post:
Hello HD!

This week we have two special plan upgrade offers. These will be available for a very limited time.

Current Offers:
-Order our "256 Volts" plan annually and get a free upgrade to the "512 Volts" plan when you use the coupon "HDUPGRADE256".
-Order our "512 Volts" plan annually and get a free upgrade to the "1024 Volts" plan when you use the coupon "HDUPGRADE512".

Note: It might take up to 24 hours for us to manually upgrade you, so please be patient.

*Only applies to the first 15 clients and coupon can only be used once.
